wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Robert Greaves, Baron Greaves (27 July 1942 – 23 March 2021) was a British politician and life peer. He was a Liberal Democrat member of the House of Lords.

response: *Tony Greaves, Baron Greaves (1942–2021), British Liberal Democrat politician
*Tony Greaves, Baron Greaves, 78, British politician and peer, member of the House of Lords (since 2000).Pendle councillor and life peer Lord Tony Greaves has died aged 78
